title: BRIEF-Pandora Media Says CEO Roger Lynch's Total Compensation Was $12.7 Mln For Period Between September 18, 2017 And December 31, 2017
text:
Market News April 10, 2018 / 8:14 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Pandora Media Says CEO Roger Lynch's Total Compensation Was $12.7 Mln For Period Between September 18, 2017 And December 31, 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Pandora Media Inc: 
* PANDORA MEDIA INC SAYS CEO ROGER LYNCH'S TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $12.7 MLN FOR THE PERIOD BETWEEN SEPTEMBER 18, 2017 AND DECEMBER 31, 2017 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2EBOiUB ) Further company coverage:
